blocks.title: Practice Mock Interviewing
blocks.content: The Sail platform provides users the opportunity to practice interviewing with our mock interview service. For more information about the interviewing resources and services we provide click the icon above.

blocks.title: Resume Resources and Templates
blocks.content: Need to touch up your Resume? Take a look at the resources our team can provide by clicking the icon above.

blocks.title: Cover Letter Resources and Templates
blocks.content: To view the resources and cover letter templates our team has click the icon above.

blocks.title: Email Resources and Templates
blocks.content: To view the resources and email templates our team has click the icon above.

blocks.title: Communication and Negotiating
blocks.content: Communicating professionally is a skill that lasts a lifetime. To get more knowledge on the communication skills and resources we provide click the icon above.

popular.title: Popular Skills Within Your Profession
popular.subTitle: Develop New Skills to Set Yourself Apart

travel.title: Need Additional Help?
travel.subtitle: Get In Contact With Our Team
travel.content: We Understand that these resources might not be the answer everyone is looking for. Reach out to our team for additional help and we will be happy to help you locate the resources you need to grow.

bottomBlock.title: Start Using Sail Today
bottomBlock.subTitle: Apply One Swipe At A Time
bottomBlock.content: Sail is the convenient way to find & apply for job opportunities around the world.
